Reviews.Title: Interesting Camera
Reviews.Author: dhyaku
Reviews.Content: I got this one because I really wanted to try 360 panorama shot. This function is very interesting. Even though you need to practice to capture perfect 360 panorama, the photo with the function is really impressive and looks creative. Touch screen is very responsive and easy to use. It seems like using iPhone. I think the shortcoming of this camera is battery life. You definitely need extra battery if you travel with this guy.FYI, photos with this camera are available to see on my Flickr[...]

ProductInfo.Features:
16MP EXR BSI CMOS Sensor
Fujinon 5x Wide Angle Optical Zoom (28 - 140mm)
Full HD H.264 1080p movies w/ Sound @ 30fps
Motion Panorama 360° mode
SD / SDHC / SDXC
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix Z900EXR Blue 16 MP CMOS Sensor with 5 x Optical Zoom Touchscreen Digital Camera Blue
